Uses of Interface
eea.engine.action.Action

Packages that use Action
eea.engine.action.basicactions This package provides a set of default basic actions that modify objects. 
eea.engine.event This package provides the generic event classes in the eea framework. 
 

Uses of Action in eea.engine.action.basicactions
 

Classes in eea.engine.action.basicactions that implement Action
 class ChangeStateAction
          A ChangeStateAction is an action used to change the game state, e.g.
 class ChangeStateInitAction
          A ChangeStateInitAction is an action used to change the game to its initial state, e.g.
 class DestroyEntityAction
          A DestroyEntityAction is used to "destroy" and entity by removing it from the list of active entities in the StateBasedEntityManager.
 class MoveBackwardAction
          A MoveBackwardAction is an action used to model a backwards move of an entity.
 class MoveDownAction
          A MoveDownAction is an action used to model a downwards move of an entity.
 class MoveForwardAction
          A MoveForwardAction is an action used to model a forwards move of an entity.
 class MoveLeftAction
          A MoveLeftAction is an action used to model a move of an entity to the left.
 class Movement
          Movement models the movement of an entity based on the current speed
 class MoveRightAction
          A MoveLeftAction is an action used to model a move of an entity to the right.
 class MoveUpAction
          A MoveUpAction is an action used to model a upwards move of an entity.
 class QuitAction
          A QuitAction is a simple but important action that is used inform the game that the user has quit (finished/left) the game This is typically the case when the user has pressed a certain button or key, e.g.
 class RemoveEventAction
          The RemoveEventAction is a straightforward action that is used to remove the chosen event from the underlying entity.
 class RotateLeftAction
          A RotateLeftAction is an action used to model the rotation of an entity to the left, more precisely: in counter-clockwise direction.
 class RotateRightAction
          A RotateLeftAction is an action used to model the rotation of an entity to the left, more precisely: in clockwise direction.
 class SetEntityPositionAction
          SetEntityPositionAction models the explicit placement of an entity to a given spot.
 

Uses of Action in eea.engine.event
 

Methods in eea.engine.event with parameters of type Action
 void Event.addAction(Action action)
          adds the given Action to the event
 void Event.removeAction(Action action)
          removes the given Action from the event
